widget.name: Debugmode Reader
widget.description:
It's a techie / developer geek focused app delivering easy access to contents from debugmode.net authored by Mr. Dhananjay Kumar / @debug_mode. This is an unofficial app and is a tribute towards his excellence and passion towards delivering back his knowledge and experience to the community. #Respect /DJ
Features: • View blogs shared on debugmode.net with easy • Watch Videos shared on youtube by Dhananjay Kumar. • Access his twitter feeds. • Links allowing you to connect with him socially online.
widget.author: Sunny Kumar
